body_html: @mingfeima Also we noticed that MKL-DNN uses OpenMP 4.0 SIMD extensions which is not supported by MSVC and hence can't be used on Windows (it might be difficult to ask users to use ICC since it's proprietary). Do we have a solution in mind for Windows in this case?
body_text: @mingfeima Also we noticed that MKL-DNN uses OpenMP 4.0 SIMD extensions which is not supported by MSVC and hence can't be used on Windows (it might be difficult to ask users to use ICC since it's proprietary). Do we have a solution in mind for Windows in this case?
body: @mingfeima Also we noticed that MKL-DNN uses OpenMP 4.0 SIMD extensions which is not supported by MSVC and hence can't be used on Windows (it might be difficult to ask users to use ICC since it's proprietary). Do we have a solution in mind for Windows in this case?
